name: Vardrik
description:
Zombies have risen!

...And you're one of them! With the guidance of Vardrik, the floating skull, fight your way through the 'brainless' in order to dig up the truth surrounding your revival.

Experience classic side scrolling action! The likes of which has been seen in countless games over the years!

::Controls::

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Enter - Attack

Space - Jump

::Hints::

A true swordsman strikes with precision. Time your attacks for maximum efficiency!

Remember where Health Chests are... Some say they regenerate over time.
